title: Point GMCQ
body: Which of the following options would you consider to be correct on the image?

_feedback.correct: Congratulations, this is the correct feedback.

_incorrect.notFinal: Unfortunately this is the incorrect feedback.
_incorrect.final: Unfortunately this is the final incorrect feedback.

_partlyCorrect.notFinal: This is the partly correct feedback.
_partlyCorrect.final: This is the final partly correct feedback.
